items.title: HDFC Life sees weakening early policy renewals, long-term retention grows
items.description: HDFC Life reported mixed retention metrics in Q1FY26, with its 13th month persistency slipping to 82.7 percent due to a lower share of large-ticket policies after tax changes

items.title: HDFC Life starts FY26 on a stable footing, eyes stronger second half
items.description: HDFC Life delivered a stable performance in Q1FY26 with double-digit APE and VNB growth. While margins improved modestly, the management remains cautious on near-term growth due to macro pressures but expects a stronger second half of the fiscal

items.title: Axis Bank Q1 Preview: NII, profit to grow in low single-digits as loan growth slows, margins shrink
items.description: Axis Bank is likely to report a muted performance for the January–March quarter, as slow loan growth, shrinking margins, and rising slippages weigh on earnings.

items.title: Coffee Day Enterprises shares jump 10% after Dolly Khanna's name appears in shareholding pattern
items.description: Coffee Day Enterprises share price: Khanna held 32.78 lakh shares at the end of the June quarter, representing 1.55% stake in the company.

items.title: Taking Stock: Market snaps 4-day fall; Nifty near 25,200, Sensex rises 317 pts
items.description: BSE Midcap and Smallcap indices rose nearly 1 percent each, extending the gains on second consecutive day.

items.title: Nifty Jumps Past 25,200 Amid Broad-Based Buying| HCLTech Sulks Post Q1| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty jumps past 25,200 briefly amid broad-based buying. Broader markets outperform; mid & smallcaps extend gains. All sectors, barring metals, end in green. Auto, pharma & PSU banks among top gainers. Nifty gainers: Hero, Bajaj, Sun Pharma, Apollo Hosp. Nifty losers: HCLTech, Eternal, SBI Life, HDFC Life, Tata Steel. Join Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they break down the week’s market action and highlight stocks to watch.

items.title: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries shares surge 2.72% amid high volume, among top gainers on Nifty 50
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 1,728.30, Sun Pharmaceutical Industries demonstrates strong financial metrics and active corporate actions, contributing to its market performance.

items.title: Indian Hotels Company shares rise 2% in today's session
items.description: The revenue for the quarter-ending March 2025 stood at Rs 2,425.14 Crore, up from Rs 1,905.34 Crore in March 2024

items.title: NMDC shares decline 1.53% amid volume surge; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 68.01, NMDC experienced a notable decrease of 1.53% during today's session.

items.title: Varun Beverages shares rise 2.04%
items.description: Shares of Varun Beverages were up 2.04% to Rs 470.60 in Tuesday's session.

items.title: Yes Bank shares gain 3% after report says Japan's SMFG eyeing $1.1 billion investment
items.description: Yes Bank share price: SMFG is seeking to acquire nearly 5 percent stake in the Indian private lender from US investment fund Carlyle Group and other minority shareholders, Bloomberg reported.

items.title: Nykaa shares fall 2% as price declines
items.description: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Nykaa shares are currently trading lower, reflecting the day's price movement.

items.title: Coromandel International shares fall 2.10%; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Coromandel International shares traded lower in Tuesday's session, reflecting the bearish sentiment.

items.title: Ajanta Pharma shares gain marginally amid high volume in today's session
items.description: Ajanta Pharma's revenue for the quarter ending March 2025 stood at Rs 1,170.41 Crore, compared to Rs 1,054.08 Crore for the quarter ending March 2024

items.title: LIC Housing Finance shares rise 2.08% on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The annual revenue has grown from Rs 19,881.70 Crore in 2021 to Rs 28,110.08 Crore in 2025, reflecting a consistent upward trend

items.title: Paytm shares climb over 2%, rise for the fourth straight day on potential MSCI re-entry
items.description: Paytm shares rose over 2 percent to Rs 999 on July 15, marking their fourth straight day of gains and extending their monthly gain to 6.6 percent

items.title: Suzlon Energy shares rise 2.46%; among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The company's annual revenue has increased significantly, from Rs 3,345.72 Crore in 2021 to Rs 10,889.74 Crore in 2025

items.title: Hindustan Unilever shares edge marginally higher on July 15
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 2,520.70, Hindustan Unilever shows a slight gain compared to its previous close.

items.title: Yes Bank shares gain over 2%, among top performers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 20.41, Yes Bank's performance reflects an increase from its previous close, supported by recent financial results and corporate developments.

items.title: IDFC First Bank shares continue downward slide, falls 6% in 5 days
items.description: UBS initiated coverage with a neutral rating and flagged high credit costs and operational expenses as medium-term challenges for growth and profitability

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Sun Pharma, Blue Star, Hero MotoCorp, Britannia, Acutaas Chemicals, Religare Enterprises and others on July 16?
items.description: The market needs to reclaim and sustain above the 20-day EMA to witness a further northward journey in the upcoming sessions. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.
